newsitem.title: EU: EP Budgets Committee agenda - July 22-23.
newsitem.headline: EP Budgets Committee agenda - July 22-23.

text.p: Adoption of draft opinion 11.3 Communication on accidents and wounds (T04308) COD97132 COM(97)0178 C4-0229/97 + BUDG Avis A HAUG Jutta. (PSE) (PE222.901 ) F ENVI Fond R (PPE) - Adoption of draft opinion 12. South Africa - concluding the Agreement for scientific and technological cooperation (T04572) CNS97112 COM(97)0119 C4-0264/97 + BUDG Avis L (PE222.909 ) F ENER Fond R SCAPAGNINI Umberto. ( ) (PE222.954 ) - Adoption of draft opinion 13. Air pollution by emissions from motor vehicles (amendment of Directive 70/156 and 70/220/EEC) (T05439) COD96164B COM(97)0061 C4-0088/97 + BUDG Avis L F ENVI Fond R LANGE Bernd. Effects of certain plans and programmes on the environment (T05466) **II SYN96304 COM(96)0511 C4-0191/97 + BUDG Avis L F ENVI Fond R GAHRTON Per. (V ) - Adoption of a draft opinion in the form of a letter 19. Date of next meeting (PE/III/OJ/97-14 ) A D D E N D U M ===] 1997 budget 8.1 Possible transfers - Transfer of appropriations 14/97: KEDO - Transfer of appropriations 24/97: ECIR - Transfer of appropriations 25/97: Telecom - Transfer of appropriations 26/97: IDA - Transfer of appropriations 27/97: Data-processing cooperation - Transfer of appropriations 29/97: Staff 8.2 Transfers concerning information policy - Transfer of appropriations 28/97: Euronews - Transfer of appropriations 31/97: Audiovisual equipment ===] Appointment of draftsmen 1.
